## nhost link

Link Project

### Synopsis

Connect your already hosted Nhost Project to local environment and start development or testings.

```
nhost link [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for link
```

      --config string     config file (default is $HOME/.nhost.yaml)
